title.native: ナースウィッチ小麦ちゃんマジカルて

description:
Ungrar, the King of Viruses, has escaped from his prison cell in Vaccine World. Maya, the Goddess of Vaccine World sends Mugimaru down to Earth to find a human to accept the powers of Vaccine World and become the Magical Nurse. He finds the best (and the only willing) person for the job when he meets Komugi Nakahara. Komugi is a playful, lazy, and easily distracted (typical) teenager whose dream is to become a cosplay idol. Balancing her career with the Kiri-Pro Promotion Company and her new job battling Ungrar's loyal henchman, the Magical Maid Koyori, Komugi delights audiences in this parody anime series.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

node.description:
__Associated Names:__ Poyoyon Rock (ぽよよんろっく), Poyoyon♥Rock (ぽよよん♥ろっく), Pucchin Purin

[Twitter (NSFW)](https://twitter.com/punipoyo)

A Japanese animator, character designer, and animation director currently living in Tokyo, Japan. He often goes by the pseudonym Poyoyon Rock.  He is also a member of the doujinshi circle Pokopii.  

(Source: Wikipedia)

Yasuhiro Takemoto studied animation at the Yoyogi Animation Academy. After graduating, he started working at [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/Kyoto-Animation) for almost his entire animation career, joining the company in 1996. At the company, Yasuhiro was considered one of the most reliable and trustworthy members of the staff. [Nurse Witch Komugi](https://anilist.co/anime/615/Nurse-Witch-Komugichan/) was his directorial debut​ and [Full Metal Panic? Fumoffu](https://anilist.co/anime/72/Full-Metal-Panic-Fumoffu/) his first solo directorial debut.

He died in the arson attack at Kyoto Animation's Studio 1 on July 18, 2019.

Fumoffu](https://anilist.co/anime/72/Full-Metal-Panic-Fumoffu/) his first solo directorial debut.

He died in the arson attack at Kyoto Animation's Studio 1 on July 18, 2019.

After graduating, he started working at [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/Kyoto-Animation) for almost his entire animation career, joining the company in 1996. Fumoffu](https://anilist.co/anime/72/Full-Metal-Panic-Fumoffu/) his first solo directorial debut.

He died in the arson attack at Kyoto Animation's Studio 1 on July 18, 2019.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1519543115367206913)

Originating from [Kyoto Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/2/). Currently affiliated with [Wit Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/jacomamire)

[Twitter](https://x.com/yonetanikantoku)

Yoshitomo Yonetani was born  in Tokyo and graduated Tokyo Designer Gakuin. He is the leader of Studio 7 at Sunrise and was responsible for their super robot cult series Yuusha Ou GaoGaiGar as well as Brigadoon and Betterman.

Yoshitomo was inspired working in the animation industry after having seen Mirai Shounen Conan.

He started as production assistent at Toei Douga, before moving to Shin-Ei Douga and finally Sunrise.

Other than anime director he is also a song writer for several anime series and sings anime themes under the name of ※-mai.
Married to [Asako Nishida](https://anilist.co/staff/111163/).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/gotoujio)__

Junji Gotou is a Japanese animator and character designer, who mainly does animation direction and key animation.
Kouhei Kawase is a Japanese producer, composer and radio personality.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sunma47) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/三間雅文)

One of the industry's most prolific sound directors, having worked on more than 300 productions.

After having graduated college, Mima joined Magic Capsule, a sound production company ran by his relative [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062/). In 1986, he debuted as a sound director on [MD Geist](https://anilist.co/anime/1285/MD-Geist/). He left Magic Capsule in 1996, and later joined Techno Sound. In 2004, he became the studio's representative director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/322024775) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=31360576)

Married to fellow animator [Shinsaku Kouzuma](https://anilist.co/staff/135006/)

After graduating from Yoyogi Animation Gakuin, he joined [Telecom Animation Film](https://anilist.co/studio/94/). Currently he mainly works with [Wit Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/), but has previously worked for studios such as [Telecom](https://anilist.co/studio/94/), [Shin-Ei](https://anilist.co/studio/247/) and [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).

Made his debut as a director with [Hal](https://anilist.co/anime/16528/) in 2013.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/matagadaisuke33)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ynaritaka)

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakouyukie) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BD%90%E5%85%89%E5%B9%B8%E6%81%B5)

Yukie Sakou is an animator and character designer.

**Height:** 160 cm 

[Blog](http://ameblo.jp/momoi-ktkr/) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/momoiktkr)

**Height:** 160 cm 

[Blog](http://ameblo.jp/momoi-ktkr/) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/momoiktkr)

__Masaya Koike__ is a Japanese guitarist, composer and member of musical unit ULTRA-PRISM.

**Height:** 160 cm 

[Blog](http://ameblo.jp/momoi-ktkr/) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/momoiktkr)
**Soyo Oka** is a Japanese musician and composer. She worked for Nintendo between 1987 and 1995.
